alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Cleburne; Conway; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Izard; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:41AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stone, eastern Searcy, western Izard, southeastern Marion, Van Buren, western Cleburne, southeastern Baxter, northeastern Conway and northeastern Faulkner Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1040 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yellville to near Marshall to Rocky Hill to near Clinton to Claude to near Cleveland. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Mountain View... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Marshall... Yellville... Calico Rock... Greers Ferry... Quitman... Norfork... Salesville... Damascus... Shirley... Pineville... Briarcliff... Higden... Herron... Maumee... Cartney... Elberta... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
